post.summary: Create a new WhatsApp pricing configuration
post.description: Creates a new WhatsApp pricing configuration for a specific region. Requires a unique 2-letter ISO region code and pricing values for all message types (marketing, service, utility, authentication). All pricing values must be non-negative USD amounts.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get paginated list of WhatsApp pricing configurations
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all WhatsApp pricing configurations for different regions. Each configuration includes pricing for marketing, service, utility, and authentication message types. Supports server-side pagination for efficient data browsing.

200.description: WhatsApp pricing configurations retrieved successfully with pagination metadata

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

delete.description: Permanently deletes a WhatsApp pricing configuration by its unique identifier. This action cannot be undone. The pricing configuration will no longer be available for WhatsApp message cost calculations.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get WhatsApp pricing configuration by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific WhatsApp pricing configuration by its unique identifier. Returns detailed pricing information for marketing, service, utility, and authentication message types for the specified region.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

put.summary: Update an existing WhatsApp pricing configuration
put.description: Updates an existing WhatsApp pricing configuration with new values. Requires the ID of the existing configuration and new pricing values for all message types (marketing, service, utility, authentication). All pricing values must be non-negative USD amounts.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get WhatsApp pricing configuration by region code
get.description: Retrieves WhatsApp pricing configuration for a specific region using the 2-letter ISO region code. Includes pricing for marketing, service, utility, and authentication message types. Optionally falls back to default pricing if region-specific pricing is not available.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

Sends a test event to the webhook endpoint

401.description: Unauthorized
Unauthorized

get.summary: WhatsApp webhook verification endpoint
get.description: Handles WhatsApp webhook verification requests from Facebook's WhatsApp Business API platform. This endpoint is called by Facebook to verify the webhook URL during initial setup. It validates the hub.mode, hub.verify_token, and hub.challenge parameters against the configured WABA_HUB_TOKEN environment variable.

post.description: Receives and processes webhook notifications from Facebook's WhatsApp Business API platform. Handles various WhatsApp events including message status updates, delivery receipts, read receipts, and incoming messages. The payload must contain a 'whatsapp_business_account' object type with entry data for processing.

post.summary: Subscribe WhatsApp Business Account to webhook notifications
post.description: Subscribes a WhatsApp Business Account (WABA) to receive webhook notifications for various WhatsApp events. This endpoint configures the WABA to send notifications to this service's webhook endpoint when messages are sent, delivered, read, or when other status changes occur.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description:
Receives and processes webhook events from Telnyx for messaging and voice services.
This endpoint handles:
- Messaging events (event_type starting with 'message.') - SMS delivery status, received messages
- Voice events (event_type starting with 'call.') - call.initiated, call.answered, call.transcription, call.hangup

The webhook payload is automatically parsed to determine the event type and published to Kafka for async processing.
Voice events are used for WhatsApp phone number verification via voice call transcription.

Note: This endpoint accepts raw JSON payloads and performs custom deserialization based on the event type.
Endpoint for TCR to send brand and campaign status updates. Events are published to Kafka for async processing.

Receives and processes webhook events from OpenAI API for background responses and other async operations.
This endpoint handles various OpenAI events including:
- response.completed: Background response generation completed
- response.failed: Background response generation failed
- response.cancelled: Background response generation cancelled
- response.incomplete: Background response generation incomplete

The webhook payload is verified using HMAC-SHA256 signature validation following Standard Webhooks specification.
Events are automatically routed to appropriate processors based on the event type.

get.summary: Get transactions for a customer with pagination

401.description: Unauthorized

get.summary: Get all transactions related to a specific message

401.description: Unauthorized

get.summary: Get transaction by ID

401.description: Unauthorized

post.description: Creates a new message template using the enhanced template definition format. This endpoint supports multi-channel templates with advanced features like buttons, headers, footers, and dynamic variables. Templates can be configured for SMS, WhatsApp, or multi-channel delivery with channel-specific content variations. The template will be automatically validated and submitted for platform approval where required.

400.description: Invalid request - validation errors in template definition structure

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

delete.description: Deletes a template for the specified customer with smart deletion strategy. Deletion behavior: - If template has NO messages: Permanently deleted from database (hard delete). - If template has messages: Marked as deleted but preserved for message history (soft delete with snapshot). DeleteFromMeta behavior: - When true and template is from Meta import: attempts to delete from WhatsApp Business API (fails if Meta API deletion fails). - When true and template is NOT from Meta import: skips Meta deletion, only deletes locally (operation succeeds). - When false or null: only deletes locally, no Meta API calls made.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer Id, or sender id to which the item belongs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the item to retrieve.

parameters.name: deleteFromMeta
parameters.description: Indicates whether to delete the template from Meta's WhatsApp Business API.

204.description: Template deleted successfully - no content returned

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get a specific template by customer ID and template ID
get.description: Retrieve a single template for a specific customer using both customer ID and template ID. Returns the complete template data including definition, status, and metadata.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid API key required

put.description: Updates an existing message template using partial update format. Only provided fields in the 'updates' dictionary will be updated - null/empty fields are ignored. The display name (displayName) can always be updated, while definition, category, and language can only be updated when the template status is DRAFT or REJECTED. Set submitForReview to true to automatically submit the template for platform approval after updating.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Customer ID from the route parameter (optional - only populated when route contains {customerId}).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the record to update.

200.description: Template updated successfully - returns the updated template data

post.description: Creates a new payment record in the system for a specific customer. Requires customer ID, amount, and transaction ID. Optionally accepts description and payment method. The payment is initially created with a 'Pending' status and can be later processed for completion. Returns the created payment details with a 201 Created status.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all payment records for a specific customer. Supports server-side pagination for efficient data browsing. Returns payment details including amounts, transaction IDs, payment status, and timestamps. Useful for customer payment history and financial reporting.

Returns complete payment details if found.

This endpoint should be called after payment confirmation from external payment processors. Updates payment status to 'Completed' and adds the payment amount to the customer's available balance for messaging services.

post.description:
Initiates the complete setup process for a sender profile. Validates configuration fields and starts background orchestration including:
                - Copying profile fields from referenced profiles (if SendingPhoneNumberProfileId or SendingWhatsappNumberProfileId are set)
                - Processing Telnyx messaging profile setup (if using SMS)
                - Processing WhatsApp phone registration (if using WhatsApp)
                - Updating sender profile status to COMPLETED
                The process runs asynchronously after validation.

post.summary: Complete KYC submission in one operation
post.description:
Completes KYC submission by:
                1. Updating KYC with primaryUseCase & expectedMessagingVolume
                2. Updating Customer name from businessName and phone from contactPhone
                3. Creating ConversionFlow with KYC_COMPLETED status
                All operations are performed sequentially for consistency.

200.description: KYC completed successfully - returns conversion flow ID

post.description: Associates an instantiated phone number with a customer across all systems (database, Telnyx messaging profile, WhatsApp WABA). Sets CustomerId and UsedAt timestamp in database. Optionally assigns to Telnyx messaging profile (AssignToMessagingProfile, default: true). Optionally registers to WhatsApp Business Account (RegisterInWaba, default: true). Updates customer fields including SendingPhoneNumber and WhatsApp-related fields. Uses all-or-nothing transaction semantics with automatic rollback on failure. Optionally updates the customer's AllowNumberChangeDuringOnboarding setting. The phone number must exist and not already be associated with another customer.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get available instantiated phone numbers
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of available instantiated phone numbers. By default, returns all numbers not associated with any customer. Use the OnlyFree parameter to filter for numbers that are completely free (both CustomerId and UsedAt are null).

parameters.name: onlyFree
parameters.description:
Optional filter to retrieve only completely free numbers (where both CustomerId and UsedAt are null).
If true, returns only numbers that have never been used.
If false or null, returns all numbers not currently associated with a customer.

200.description: Available phone numbers retrieved successfully with pagination metadata

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description: Creates a new instantiated phone number record. The phone number will be created with a generated ID and CreatedAt timestamp. CustomerId and UsedAt will be null by default, making the number immediately available for association.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

delete.description: Permanently deletes an instantiated phone number from the system. The phone number must not be associated with any customer. This action cannot be undone.

parameters.name: phoneNumberId
parameters.description:
The unique identifier of the phone number to delete.
The phone number must not be associated with any customer.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description: Removes the association between a phone number and customer across all systems (database, Telnyx messaging profile, WhatsApp WABA). Clears CustomerId and UsedAt in database. Optionally removes from Telnyx messaging profile (RemoveFromMessagingProfile, default: true). Optionally deregisters from WhatsApp Business Account (RemoveFromWhatsApp, default: true). Clears customer fields including SendingPhoneNumber and WhatsApp phone-related fields (keeps WhatsappBusinessAssociateId). Uses all-or-nothing transaction semantics with automatic rollback on failure. The phone number must exist and currently be associated with a customer.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get instantiated phone number by customer ID with optional phone number search
get.description: Retrieves the instantiated phone number associated with a specific customer ID. Optionally supports searching for a specific phone number (partial or full match). Returns null if no phone number is found.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The customer ID to search for

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Optional phone number to search for (supports partial matching)

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

put.description: Updates the country, number type, and/or provider for an instantiated phone number. At least one field must be provided. Fields are validated against allowed values.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the phone number to update.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get paginated list of default channels by country
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of default channel configurations for all countries. Each record contains the country code, default channel preference, and whether the decision is definitive. Supports server-side pagination with configurable page size.

200.description: Default channels retrieved successfully with pagination metadata

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

put.summary: Update default channel configuration for a country
put.description: Updates the default channel preference and definitive decision flag for a specific country code. The default channel must be either 'sms' or 'whatsapp'. The definitive decision flag indicates whether this choice is final or can be overridden.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required
Unauthorized
Unauthorized
Unauthorized

post.description: Initiates the complete onboarding process for a customer with WhatsApp integration. Validates WhatsApp configuration fields and starts background orchestration including phone number verification, webhook setup, and platform integration. The process runs asynchronously after validation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

delete.description: Deletes a customer from the system. By default, performs a soft delete (sets isDeleted flag) which preserves data and allows restoration. Set IsSoftDelete=false for permanent hard delete which cannot be undone and removes all associated data including contacts, message activities, and configurations.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get customer details by ID
get.description: Retrieves complete customer information including contact details, messaging configurations, and platform integrations (Telnyx and WhatsApp). Returns all customer data needed for administration and configuration.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

put.description: Partially updates customer information using key-value pairs. Supports updating any customer field including name, phone numbers, and integration configurations (Telnyx, WhatsApp). Only provided fields will be updated, existing values remain unchanged.

200.description: Customer updated successfully with new values

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get paginated list of customers
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of customers in the system. Supports filtering by type: 'PROFILE' for sender profiles only, 'ORGANIZATION' for organizations only, or omit for all customers. Supports server-side pagination with configurable page size.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Filter customers by type: "profile" for sender profiles (ParentId IS NOT NULL),
"organization" for organizations (ParentId IS NULL), or null/empty for all customers

200.description: Customers retrieved successfully with pagination metadata

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description: Creates a new customer with the specified name and email. The customer will be assigned a unique ID and timestamp. Additional configuration such as phone numbers and integration settings can be added later via the update endpoint.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

put.summary: Append additional data to customer conversion flow
put.description: Appends JSON data as a new entry to the additionalData array of a customer conversion flow record identified by CustomerId and Status. Each append creates a new array element, enabling JSONL-like functionality.

200.description: Additional data appended successfully to conversion flow array

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.summary: Create a new customer conversion flow
post.description: Creates a new conversion flow record for tracking a customer's journey through the onboarding process. Includes validation of customer existence and status values.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get customer conversion flows with filtering and pagination
get.description: Retrieves customer conversion flow records with advanced filtering capabilities. Supports filtering by customer ID, status, and searching within notes. Returns flows ordered by creation date (newest first).

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get customer conversion flow by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific customer conversion flow record by its unique identifier. Returns detailed information about the customer's journey stage, including status, notes, and metadata.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get customer conversion flows by customer ID
get.description: Retrieves all conversion flow records for a specific customer, ordered by creation date (newest first). Shows the complete journey history from signup to onboarding.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get customer conversion flows by customer ID with pagination
get.description: Convenience endpoint to retrieve customer conversion flows filtered by customer ID with pagination support. Alternative to the existing non-paginated customer endpoint.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get customer conversion flows by status
get.description: Convenience endpoint to retrieve customer conversion flows filtered by a specific status. Supports pagination.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get customer conversion flow status summary
get.description: Retrieves a summary of conversion flow statuses showing counts for each status. Useful for dashboard metrics and reporting.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

put.description: Marks a customer as unresponsive to prevent further communication attempts. Sets the unresponsive flag to true and records the timestamp.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description: Endpoint for sending channel notifications (SMS or WhatsApp) in customer conversion flow based on conversion status.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description: Endpoint for sending email notifications in customer conversion flow based on conversion status.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.summary: Analyze KYC completed customer for whitelisting
post.description: Analyzes a customer who has completed KYC using OpenAI to determine if they are a candidate for whitelisting based on their business profile and KYC information.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

put.description: Updates the status of an existing customer conversion flow record. Includes optional notes for context.

200.description: Customer conversion flow status updated successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description: Adds a specified amount to a customer's messaging balance. Requires a positive amount and description for the transaction. Optionally accepts a reference ID for external tracking. This operation creates a credit transaction in the customer's account history and updates their available balance for messaging services. Useful for manual top-ups, refunds, or promotional credits.

200.description: Funds added successfully and updated balance returned

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get comprehensive customer balance summary with transaction totals
get.description: Retrieves a detailed balance summary for a customer including current balance, lifetime total credits, lifetime total deductions, and last update timestamp. This provides a comprehensive financial overview of the customer's account activity and current standing. Useful for financial reporting, customer service inquiries, and account reconciliation.

200.description: Balance summary retrieved successfully with complete transaction totals

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get current customer balance details
get.description: Retrieves the current balance information for a specific customer including their available balance, last update timestamp, and balance record metadata. This endpoint provides the essential balance information needed for account management and transaction processing. Returns the customer's current messaging balance available for sending messages.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.summary: Initialize customer balance account with optional starting amount
post.description: Creates a new balance record for a customer, optionally with an initial balance amount. This endpoint should be called when setting up a new customer's account or when a customer's balance record needs to be recreated. The initial balance defaults to zero if not specified. Returns the newly created balance record with a 201 Created status.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required
Unauthorized
Unauthorized
Unauthorized
Unauthorized
Unauthorized
Unauthorized

get.summary: Get contact by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific contact by their unique identifier for a given customer. Returns detailed contact information including phone number, creation date, and messaging capabilities.

200.description: Contact found and returned successfully with complete contact details

401.description: Unauthorized

get.summary: Get contact by phone number
get.description: Retrieves a contact by their phone number for a given customer. Phone number should be in international format (e.g., +1234567890). Returns complete contact details including messaging capabilities.

200.description: Contact found and returned successfully with complete contact details

401.description: Unauthorized

post.summary: Create multiple contacts by phone numbers
post.description: Creates multiple contacts for a customer using phone numbers. Phone numbers should be in international format (e.g., +1234567890). Maximum 10 phone numbers allowed per request, no duplicates permitted. Existing contacts with the same phone numbers will be skipped.

200.description: Contacts created successfully for provided phone numbers

401.description: Unauthorized

get.summary: Get paginated contacts by customer
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of contacts for a specific customer. Supports server-side pagination with configurable page size. Returns contact details including messaging capabilities and creation timestamps.

200.description: Contacts retrieved successfully with pagination metadata

401.description: Unauthorized

post.description: Creates contacts for a customer from CSV data containing phone numbers. This endpoint is currently under development and will support bulk contact creation from CSV file uploads. Phone numbers should be in international format.

401.description: Unauthorized

get.summary: Get a campaign by ID
get.description: Retrieves a campaign and its use cases by ID. Accessible by Admin or Customer.

401.description: Unauthorized

put.summary: Update a campaign and its use cases
put.description: Updates campaign fields and replaces use cases if provided. Accessible by Admin or Customer.

401.description: Unauthorized

delete.description: Deletes a campaign. If the campaign was submitted to TCR, it will be deactivated in TCR first before being deleted locally. Accessible by Admin or Customer.

401.description: Unauthorized

get.summary: Get all campaigns for a customer
get.description: Retrieves all campaigns for a specific customer. Accessible by Admin or Customer.

401.description: Unauthorized

post.summary: Create a new campaign with use cases
post.description: Creates a campaign and associated use cases. Accessible by Admin or Customer.

401.description: Unauthorized

post.description: Submits campaign to TCR API. Campaign must be linked to an approved brand.

401.description: Unauthorized

put.summary: Replace all campaigns for a KYC form submission
put.description: Updates the KYC form's expectedMessagingVolume, deletes all existing campaigns for the KYC form, and creates new campaigns from the provided list. Accessible by Admin or Customer.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Customer ID (must match route parameter)

401.description: Unauthorized

404.description: Customer or KYC form not found

get.summary: Get all brands for a customer
get.description: Returns all TCR brands associated with the specified customer ID

401.description: Unauthorized

post.summary: Submit brand to TCR for registration
post.description: Submits brand with linked KYC data to TCR API. Brand must have KYC form linked.

401.description: Unauthorized

delete.description: Permanently deletes a campaign supporting document from both storage and database. This action cannot be undone. The document file will be removed from MinIO storage and the database record will be deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid API key required

delete.description: Deletes a brand from the system. By default, performs a soft delete (sets isDeleted flag) which preserves data. Set IsSoftDelete=false for permanent hard delete which also removes from TCR and cannot be undone. Note: Hard delete will fail if the brand has active campaigns in TCR.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid API key required

get.summary: Get campaign supporting document by ID with URLs
get.description: Retrieves a specific campaign supporting document by its ID and generates temporary pre-signed URLs for preview and download, valid for 1 hour. The URLs allow secure direct access from storage.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the supporting document

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid API key required

get.summary: Get all supporting documents for a campaign
get.description: Retrieves all uploaded supporting documents for a specific campaign. Optional pre-signed download URLs can be included (default: true). Set includeDownloadUrls=false for better performance with large document lists.

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the campaign

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid API key required

post.description: Uploads a supporting document (Call-to-Action, Privacy Policy, or Terms & Conditions) for a TCR campaign. Maximum 5 documents allowed per campaign. If campaign is already submitted to TCR, the document will also be uploaded to TCR automatically. Returns document details with pre-signed URLs.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid API key required

get.summary: Check customer KYC eligibility for phone number provisioning
get.description: Validates whether a customer has submitted all required compliance documents for a specific country/phone prefix. Returns eligibility status, required documents, submitted documents, and any missing documents needed for phone number provisioning.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the customer

parameters.name: phonePrefix
parameters.description: Phone number prefix (e.g., '+383' for Kosovo, '+1' for US)

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Liveness Probe
get.description: Kubernetes liveness probe. Returns 200 if the application is running.

get.summary: Readiness Probe
get.description: Kubernetes readiness probe. Returns 200 when application is ready to serve traffic.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a compliance document from both storage and database. This action cannot be undone. The document file will be removed from MinIO storage and the database record will be deleted.

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get compliance document by ID with download URL
get.description: Retrieves a specific compliance document by its ID and generates a temporary pre-signed download URL valid for 1 hour. The URL allows secure direct download from storage without going through the API.

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the compliance document

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

get.summary: Get all compliance documents for a customer
get.description: Retrieves all uploaded compliance documents for a specific customer, including documents for all phone number prefixes and document types. Optional pre-signed download URLs can be included.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the customer

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

post.description: Uploads a compliance document (passport, ID, proof of address, etc.) for a customer's KYC verification. If a document of the same type already exists, it will be replaced. Returns the uploaded document details with a pre-signed download URL valid for 1 hour.

400.description: Invalid request - File validation failed (size, type, or empty)

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid admin API key required

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsByI.description:
Left here for future use.
If we need to add further parameters to the request, we can do it here.

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsByC.description: Request model when providing a customer id and item id.

title.default: One or more validation errors occurred.

multiChannel.template: Hello {{customer_name}}, we're excited to have you! Your account is now active and ready to use.

customerId.description: The customer ID from the route

category.description: Category can only be updated when status is DRAFT

language.description: Language can only be updated when status is DRAFT

definition.description: Template definition can only be updated when status is DRAFT

multiChannel.template: Hello {{customer_name}}, we're excited to have you! Your account is now active and ready to use.

submitForReview.description:
When it's false, the template will be saved on our system but not submitted for review.
When this field is coming True, the template will be submitted for review.

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Complete definition of a message template including header, body, footer, and buttons

header.description: Optional template header with optional variables

body.description: Required template body with content for different channels (multi-channel, SMS-specific, or WhatsApp-specific)

footer.description: Optional template footer with optional variables

buttons.description: Optional list of interactive buttons (e.g., quick replies, URLs, phone numbers)

definitionVersion.description: The version of the template definition format

authenticationConfig.description: Configuration specific to AUTHENTICATION category templates (optional)

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Header section of a message template

template.description: The header template text with optional variable placeholders (e.g., "Welcome to {{0:variable}}")

variables.description: List of variables used in the header template

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Body section of a message template with channel-specific content

multiChannel.description: Content that will be used for all channels (SMS and WhatsApp) unless channel-specific content is provided

sms.description: SMS-specific content that overrides multi-channel content for SMS messages

whatsapp.description: WhatsApp-specific content that overrides multi-channel content for WhatsApp messages

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Footer section of a message template

template.description: The footer template text with optional variable placeholders

variables.description: List of variables used in the footer template

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsTempla.description: Interactive button in a message template

id.description: The unique identifier of the button (1-based index)

type.description: The type of button (e.g., QUICK_REPLY, URL, PHONE_NUMBER, VOICE_CALL, COPY_CODE)

props.description: Properties specific to the button type

addSecurityRecommendation.description: Whether to add the security recommendation text: "For your security, do not share this code."

codeExpirationMinutes.description: Code expiration time in minutes (1-90). If set, adds footer: "This code expires in X minutes."

SentDmServicesCommonContractsAPIsWhatsap.description:
Unified response wrapper that handles both successful responses and errors
for the WhatsApp templates list endpoint.

templates.description: The template data if the request was successful.

error.description: Error information if the request failed.

SentDmServicesCommonContractsAPIsWhatsap.description:
Response model for GET /{whatsapp-business-account-id}/message_templates
Represents the list of WhatsApp message templates from Facebook Graph API.
Individual WhatsApp message template from the templates list.
Quality score information for a template.
Paging information for paginated template lists.
Summary information about the templates (if requested).

allOf.description:
Request model for retrieving WhatsApp Business Account templates from Facebook Graph API.
All filter parameters are optional and can be combined for more specific results.

Request model for importing a WhatsApp template from Meta/Facebook into the SentDM system.
This endpoint retrieves an approved template from Meta and creates a corresponding TemplateTwo record.

wabaTemplateId.description: WhatsApp template ID from Meta API

updates.description: Snake case representation of the fields to update.

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsByP.description:
Left here for future use.
If we need to add further parameters to the request, we can do it here.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the contact to refresh channels for

channelType.description: Optional: specific channel type to refresh (null for all channels)

contactId.description: The ID of the contact to refresh channels for

channelType.description: Optional: specific channel type to refresh (null for all channels)

example.description: Send verification codes for account authentication

multiChannel.template: Your verification code is {{code}}. Do not share this code with anyone.

description.example: Send verification codes for account authentication

multiChannel.template: Your verification code is {{code}}. Do not share this code with anyone.

allOf.description: Country-specific requirements for phone number provisioning

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g., "XK" for Kosovo, "US" for United States)

requiredDocuments.description:
List of document requirements for this country.
Each inner list represents one requirement:
- Single item list: One specific document is required (e.g., [[PASSPORT]])
- Multi-item list: Any one document from the group satisfies the requirement (e.g., [[PASSPORT, DRIVERS_LICENSE]])
Multiple requirements can be combined (e.g., [[PASSPORT, DRIVERS_LICENSE], [UTILITY_BILL]])

providers.description: List of providers supporting this country (e.g., ["TELNYX"])

monthlyCostUsd.description: Monthly cost in USD (nullable if pricing not available)

setupCostUsd.description: One-time setup cost in USD (nullable if not applicable)

isSupported.description: Whether provisioning is currently supported for this country

notes.description: Additional notes or requirements for this country

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsCre.description: Request model for creating provision requirements (excludes system-managed fields)

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g., "XK" for Kosovo, "US" for United States)

requiredDocuments.description:
List of document requirements for this country.
Each inner list represents one requirement:
- Single item list: One specific document is required (e.g., [[PASSPORT]])
- Multi-item list: Any one document from the group satisfies the requirement (e.g., [[PASSPORT, DRIVERS_LICENSE]])
Multiple requirements can be combined (e.g., [[PASSPORT, DRIVERS_LICENSE], [UTILITY_BILL]])

providers.description: List of providers supporting this country (e.g., ["TELNYX"])

monthlyCostUsd.description: Monthly cost in USD (nullable if pricing not available)

setupCostUsd.description: One-time setup cost in USD (nullable if not applicable)

isSupported.description: Whether provisioning is currently supported for this country

notes.description: Additional notes or requirements for this country

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 country code (e.g., "XK" for Kosovo, "US" for United States)

requiredDocuments.description:
List of document requirements for this country.
Each inner list represents one requirement:
- Single item list: One specific document is required (e.g., [[PASSPORT]])
- Multi-item list: Any one document from the group satisfies the requirement (e.g., [[PASSPORT, DRIVERS_LICENSE]])
Multiple requirements can be combined (e.g., [[PASSPORT, DRIVERS_LICENSE], [UTILITY_BILL]])

SentDmServicesCommonContractsPOCOsMessag.description:
Structured message body format for database storage.
Preserves channel-specific components (header, body, footer, buttons).

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsAss.description: Request model for associating an instantiated phone number with a customer

phoneNumberId.description: The unique identifier of the phone number to associate

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the customer to associate with the phone number

allowNumberChangeDuringOnboarding.description:
Whether the customer is allowed to change phone numbers during onboarding.
If not specified, the customer's existing setting will not be changed.

assignToMessagingProfile.description:
Whether to assign the phone number to the customer's Telnyx messaging profile.
Defaults to true.

registerInWaba.description:
Whether to register the phone number with the customer's WhatsApp Business Account (WABA).
Defaults to true.

allOf.description: Paginated list of instantiated phone numbers
Represents an instantiated phone number in the system

customerId.description:
The ID of the customer currently associated with this phone number.
Null if the number is not associated with any customer.

customerName.description:
The name of the customer currently associated with this phone number.
Null if the number is not associated with any customer.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890)

usedAt.description:
Timestamp when the phone number was first associated with a customer.
Null if the number has never been used.

country.description:
The country code for the phone number (e.g., "US").
Defaults to "US" if not specified.

numberType.description:
The type of phone number.
Defaults to LOCAL if not specified.

provider.description:
The provider managing this phone number.
Defaults to TELNYX if not specified.

SentDmServicesCommonContractsDataPhoneNu.description: Represents the type of phone number
Represents the provider managing a phone number

allOf.description: Request model for retrieving available instantiated phone numbers with pagination and filtering options

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsCre.description: Request model for creating a new instantiated phone number

phoneNumber.description:
The phone number to create. Should be in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890).
The number will be created as available (not associated with any customer).

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsDel.description: Request model for deleting an instantiated phone number

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsDis.description: Request model for dissociating an instantiated phone number from its current customer

phoneNumberId.description: The unique identifier of the phone number to dissociate from its current customer

removeFromMessagingProfile.description:
Whether to remove the phone number from the Telnyx messaging profile.
Defaults to true.

removeFromWhatsApp.description:
Whether to deregister the phone number from WhatsApp Business Account (WABA).
Defaults to true.

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsGet.description: Request model for retrieving instantiated phone number by customer ID

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsUpd.description: Request to update an instantiated phone number's metadata

country.description:
The country code for the phone number (e.g., "US").
Valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.

numberType.description: The type of phone number (LOCAL or TFN).

provider.description: The provider managing this phone number (TELNYX, SINCH, or SENT).

example.notes: Customer signed up via web portal

notes.example: Customer signed up via web portal

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsRep.description: Request to replace all campaigns for a specific KYC form submission

kycSubmissionFormId.description: KYC Form Submission ID (must match route parameter)

expectedMessagingVolume.description:
Expected messaging volume for the KYC form
This will update the KYC form submission's expectedMessagingVolume field

campaigns.description: List of campaigns to create (existing campaigns for this KYC form will be deleted)

SentDmServicesCommonContractsRequestsCre.description: Campaign creation request for KYC form (KycSubmissionFormId and CustomerId are inherited from parent)

useCases.description: List of messaging use cases for this campaign

isEligible.description: Whether the customer has submitted all required documents

requiredDocuments.description:
List of document requirements. Each inner list represents one requirement:
- Single item: one specific document required
- Multiple items: any one document from the group satisfies the requirement

submittedDocuments.description: Distinct list of all document types the customer has submitted for this phone prefix

missingDocuments.description:
List of unsatisfied requirements. Each inner list represents a missing requirement:
- If empty, customer is eligible
- Each inner list shows which documents would satisfy that requirement

AdminAuthenticationScheme.description: Admin API key for internal operations
AdminAuthenticationScheme.name: x-api-key

CustomerSenderId.description: Customer sender ID (GUID) identifying the customer account
CustomerSenderId.name: x-sender-id
